duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell Intelligent Communication Automation (ICA) software, Smart Mailing, and Shipping Solutions (MRS), and Intelligent Parcel Locker Solutions (PLS) to a large portfolio of current customers.
Pursue leads via CRM database, discover new prospects through traditional and digital marketing, and work independently to boost the customer base in the assigned region.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field
